txt.en: You have found a strange orb filled with what you believe is blood in Kaslokroz. It gives you an uneasy feeling; perhaps it is used by The Pale Herald for his dark sorceries. You decide that destroying it, and others like it, is probably in your best interests.
Strange orbs filled with blood and sorcery dot Kaslokroz, a camp of the Uruk-hai.

You tell Legolas of the strange blood orbs you destroyed in Kaslokroz.\n\n'Unusual. I have not heard of these before, but I suspect they are in some way related to his sorcery. Perhaps it is a vessel for when a living host is unavailable. You did well to destroy them, [placeholder].'
Blood orbs can be found in Kaslokroz, an Uruk-hai camp.\n\nYou should destroy the blood orbs.
You have destroyed the blood orbs in RÃ»khor's camp.\n\nYou should report your success to Legolas near Kaslokroz.
